snippet: Representative Gabrielle Giffords led the Pledge of Allegiance at a candlelight vigil to commemorate the first anniversary of a shooting in Tucson that left 6 people dead.
abstract: Rep Gabrielle Giffords leads the Pledge of Allegiance at a candlelight vigil to commemorate the first anniversary of a shooting in Tucson that left 6 people dead; it is a stirring ending to a two-day commemoration that was in many ways remarkable for how understated it was.

byline.contributor: Ford Burkhart, Carolyn Niethammer and Carli Brosseau contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Representative Gabrielle Giffords led the Pledge of Allegiance at a candlelight vigil to commemorate the first anniversary of a shooting in Tucson that left 6 people dead.

headline.seo: In Tucson, a Year After the Shooting of Gabrielle Giffords
headline.main: Subdued Remembrance of a Dark Day in Tucson
headline.print_headline: Subdued Remembrance Of a Dark Day in Tucson
